瑬字的基本解释

瑬
liú
古同“旒”，古代帝王冠冕前后下垂的玉串。
旗子上下垂的饰物：“旗九瑬。”
美金。

瑬字的汉语字典释义

[①]［liú］
［《廣韻》力求切，平尤，來。］
同“旒1”。
旗上的下垂饰物。

瑬字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　瑬； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页739第12
【唐韻】【集韻】【正韻】?力求切，音留。【說文】?玉也。冕飾。【集韻】通作旒。　又旗之下垂者。【宋書·禮志】鸞輅駕四馬，旂九瑬。　又【玉篇】美金也。亦作璆。

瑬字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
瑬字的起名意思

旗子上下垂的饰物；美金。

瑬
Basic explanation of words
瑬
liú
In ancient times, it was the same as "旒", the jade string of ancient emperor's crowns drooping back and forth.
The drooping ornaments of the flag: "The Nine Flags."
US dollars.
瑬
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［liú］
["Guangyun" strives to cut, Pingyou, come. ]
Same as "旒1".
Pendant ornaments on the flag.
瑬
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　瑬; Kangxi Strokes: 15; Page Number: Page 739-12
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Positive Rhyme]? Strive for cutting, keeping the sound. [Said the text]? Yu Ye. Mian ornaments. 【Jiyun】Through for all.　The flag is hanging again. [Song Shu·Li Zhi] Luan rounds four horses and nine flags.　[Jade articles] Dollars again. It is also used as 璆.
瑬
